PastLevelButton - Class in view
The pastLevelPanel contains one of these buttons for each level if the level is unlocked, it shows the level name and type.
PastLevelButton(Level, int) - Constructor for class view.PastLevelButton
construct a new PastLevelButton for the given level.
PastLevelPanel - Class in view
The panel that loads when the user clicks the "Levels" button in the main menu It shows all levels, locked or unlocked, each unlocked level is a button that takes you to that level when clicked
PastLevelPanel(Application) - Constructor for class view.PastLevelPanel
Construct an new PastLevelPanel in the given Application frame
PastLevelViewController - Class in controller
This controller is bound to the "Levels" button in the main menu When pressed, it takes the user to a view where they can see all of their past levels
PastLevelViewController(Application) - Constructor for class controller.PastLevelViewController
Construct a new PastLevelView controller under the given ApplicationFrame
Player - Class in model
 
Player() - Constructor for class model.Player
 
PlayPastLevelController - Class in controller
The controller attached to each Level button in the PastLevelsView clicking on the button takes you to a LevelView for that level
PlayPastLevelController(Application, Level, Level) - Constructor for class controller.PlayPastLevelController
Construct a new PlayPastLevelController in the given Application frame topPlay is the Level that will start when the button is pressed next is the Level that will be unlocked after toPlay is completed
pushMove(Level) - Method in class model.ClearMove
Update the level to reflect the changes this move creates the Tile is cleared, the board settles, and one Clear special is taken away
pushMove(Level) - Method in interface model.IMove
 
pushMove(Level) - Method in class model.RearrangeMove
Push the move to the level.
pushMove(Level) - Method in class model.SwapMove
Push the SwapMove to the level.
pushMove(Level) - Method in class model.UserMove
When a valid move is done, this method is called in order to push that move to the level This method updates the score appropriately

PuzzleTopBarPanel - Class in view
Each Level type needs to display different information in the top bar Puzzle levels need to show the movess left
